### Single image, full width

Same as `.photo-grid .cols-1` but within the layout system:

::: {layout="[1]"}
![Bamboo path](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500530855697-b586d89ba3ee?w=1200&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-layout" description="Bamboo grove path."}
:::

### Inverted pyramid

`[[1,1,1],[1,1],[1]]` narrows from three to two to one,
creating a visual funnel:

::: {layout="[[1,1,1],[1,1],[1]]"}
![Shibuya crossing](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542051841857-5f90071e7989?w=600&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="Shibuya crossing."}

![Neon at night](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1536098561742-ca998e48cbcc?w=600&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="Shinjuku neon."}

![Ramen](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557872943-16a5ac26437e?w=600&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="Tonkotsu ramen."}

![Louvre at night](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1499856871958-5b9627545d1a?w=600&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="The Louvre pyramid."}

![Café](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1514933651103-005eec06c04b?w=600&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="Corner café."}

![Bridge at dusk](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520939817895-060bdaf4fe1b?w=1200&auto=format&q=80){group="fig-pyramid" description="Pont Alexandre III."}
:::
